section.title: Interactive applet demonstration pages
section.p: These are simple pages that demonstrate basic functionality of the Jmol applet using some of the interactive scripting capabilities provided by the Jmol.js JavaScript library.

blockquote.i: Please, note that these pages are intended for demonstration run from the Jmol website server. If you try to create your own page by copying their source code, it is likely that it will not work, due to the arrangement of files needed. Please, first read general recommendations in particular, and the rest of the documentation for Jmol.js.

section.p: You can see more sophisticated applications of the Jmol applet following the list of websites that use Jmol at the Jmol Wiki.

section.title: Export to 3D scenes
section.p: Jmol can export to several 3D scene / 3D world / virtual reality formats, like VRML, X3D or U3D. Check out some sample files.
